SEARCH
Module com.example.fitnesschaingui
Package com.example.fitnesschaingui

Class ClassSchedule

java.lang.Object
com.example.fitnesschaingui.ClassSchedule
public class ClassSchedule extends Object
Represents fitness classes between all the facilities. Stores fitnessClass objects in an array and provides functionality to manipulate them.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClassSchedule

      public ClassSchedule()
      Constructor for the ClassSchedule class. initializes the empty FitnessClass array and numclasses variable.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Represents the ClassSchedule object as a string. Prints out each FitnessClass object in the array, calling the FitnessClass.toString method.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      string representation of all the FitnessClasses

    • instructorExists

      public boolean instructorExists(String instructor)
      Checks to see if the given name is an instructor. Iterates through the elements of classes array to check if any of them have the instructor.
      Parameters:
      instructor - to search for
      Returns:
      true if the instructor is found, false otherwise.

    • classExists

      public boolean classExists(String name)
      Checks to see if given class exists anywhere. Iterates through the elements of classes array to check if any of them have the same name.
      Parameters:
      name - of the class to search for.
      Returns:
      true if the class exists, false otherwise.

    • getClass

      public FitnessClass getClass(String name, String instructor, Location loc)
      Searches for a FitnessClass object matching the given parameters. Iterates through the classes array, comparing the name of each FitnessClass, instructor, and location to the parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - of the class
      instructor - of the class
      loc - location of the class
      Returns:
      the FitnessClass if it was found, null if there was none.

    • loadSchedule

      public void loadSchedule()
      Reads in a schedule of FitnessClasses from a text file. Scans through classSchedule.txt, making a FitnessClass object from each row and adding it to the classes array. Handles FileNotFoundException.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if there are any classes currently stored. Compares numClasses to zero.
      Returns:
      true if there are no classes, false otherwise.

    • isTimeConflict

      public FitnessClass isTimeConflict(Member member, FitnessClass course)
      Searches for other classes the member is signed up for at the same time as the given class. Iterates through all the other FitnessClass objects to see if they are at the same time as the given class and the given member is in the participants list for that class.
      Parameters:
      member - to look for in conflicting classes.
      course - to find conflicts for.
      Returns:
      FitnessClass that is conflicting, null if there are none.
